title: Hidden Voices: Songs by women composers
description: Join us for a celebration of ‘Religion, Belief and Philosophy’ as told through the music and songs of female composers from the 16th century to modern day. As part of LGBT History Month, Eleanor Cramer, Anita Dutta and Lara Gisborne perform beautiful and powerful songs that capture women’s thoughts and emotions through the ages, including one of the twentieth century’s most influential classical teachers.
